Package com.emit.usersecurityapi.controller

Interface BaseController<T extends DtoEntity,ID>

Type Parameters:
T - The type of DTO entity.
ID - The type of the entity's ID.
All Known Subinterfaces:
OperationController, OptionController, RolController, RolOptionController, RolUserController, UserAuditController, UserController
All Known Implementing Classes:
OperationControllerImpl, OptionControllerImpl, RolControllerImpl, RolOptionControllerImpl, RolUserControllerImpl, UserAuditControllerImpl, UserControllerImpl
@CrossOrigin(origins="*") @RequestMapping("/default") public interface BaseController<T extends DtoEntity,ID>
Base controller interface for CRUD operations on DTO entities. This interface provides common CRUD endpoints for managing DTO entities. It supports retrieving all entities, retrieving an entity by ID, saving a new entity, updating an existing entity, and deleting an entity.
Version:
1.0

  • Method Details

    • getAll

      @GetMapping("get-all") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<T>> getAll()
      Retrieves all entities of type T.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing a list of all entities.

    • getById

      @GetMapping("/get-by-id") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<T> getById(@RequestParam("id") ID id)
      Retrieves an entity of type T by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the entity to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing the retrieved entity.

    • save

      @PostMapping("/save") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<T> save(@RequestBody T dtoEntity)
      Saves a new entity of type T.
      Parameters:
      dtoEntity - The DTO entity to be saved.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing the saved entity.

    • update

      @PutMapping("/update") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<T> update(@RequestParam("id") ID id, @RequestBody T dtoEntity)
      Updates an existing entity of type T.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the entity to be updated.
      dtoEntity - The updated DTO entity.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing the updated entity.

    • delete

      @DeleteMapping("/delete") void delete(@RequestParam("id") ID id)
      Deletes an entity of type T by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the entity to be deleted.
